name: Kamlesh Porwal

education.degree: Bachelor of Technology, Computer Science & Engineering

experience.title: Software Development Intern
experience.responsibilities: Developed Expense Tracker and Exchange Rate Calculator using Java, handling 1000+ daily requests. Achieved 95% code coverage through comprehensive unit testing and debugging practices.

experience.title: Frontend Development Intern
experience.responsibilities: Built responsive E-commerce website with 98% cross-browser compatibility using modern frameworks. Created Task Manager app improving organization efficiency by 40% with JavaScript ES6+.

suggestions: Highlight Python projects and skills more prominently.  Move Python higher in the 'Programming Languages' section.
Quantify Python experience with specific accomplishments in projects or previous roles. Add a dedicated section for Python projects if needed.
Tailor the resume to emphasize relevant Python libraries and frameworks used.
Add a portfolio section with links to GitHub repositories showcasing Python-based projects.
Reduce the emphasis on front-end technologies and focus more on backend and Python-specific skills for a Python Developer role.
